channel.title: Contributor Introductions
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Contributor Introductions" - Get to know the various contributors to the BvS Wiki!

item.title: Re: Contributor Introductions
item.content:encoded:
I'm Don P.

I'm a somewhat of a BvS veteran. I got into BvS by just going about google for something to do.
After a while of playing, it was fun. I found BvS wiki after my first week of playing and the guides and things
helped me out soooo… I joined, thinking I could help someone else with my exp. and get out of ditches of the game.
My goal is to make a full character story and get a "Detective Conan" arc on BvS, and maybe start a actual RPG as well.

item.title: Re: Contributor Introductions
item.content:encoded:
Faint.Ice here.

I got into BvS a lil over a month ago with a recommendation by a friend that also plays BvS. My charas are AisuJ, JonasZ and Robin. The first two are my "primaries" and Robin is my "joke" chara. BvSwiki has saved me a lot of hassle, so lately I've been trying to contribute, though I tend to forget too lol. Anyway, I hope to own and then blow my own village somehow, but prolly not cause I suck at recruiting peoples xD. And.. yeah.. yo B)

item.title: Re: Contributor Introductions
item.content:encoded:
I'm Mathiu.

I came over to BVS from the Giant In the Playground forums and introduced it to the IRE games.
Uzuki can thank me for one of his referrals.
I'm an anal-retentive data monger that doesn't change anything without direct confirmation.

item.title: Re: Contributor Introductions
item.content:encoded:
Hi I'm Cana Hatake, Inch girl or Inch-NI

I first came across BvS when I joined Kakashi fan club at narutofan (username Inch-NI) and I was directed to it by Tpad.
I went created a player Cana and then I havent stopped playing.
I first came here when I searched for BvS fourms when I read the revamped how to play and it advised going to fourms talk rather than using the village menu.
I came here and joined and I havent stoped refrenceing here since.
Thanks for leting me join …..oh if I edit sumit could ppl double check it since I'm dyslexic thankies
I will do my best to gather information!

Inch out!

item.title: Re: Contributor Introductions
item.content:encoded: Hey i have been playing for quite some time i joined when i was on a forum called pokeplushies(got banned so i am booorrreed but i will not be bored on sunday)And somone has a picture of a yoshi i clicked iut and it sent me to BvS cool i thought so i joined and i always wanted to be a hokage.Playing it is real fun in my opinion and i will nnneeevvveeerr quit! XD

item.title: Re: Contributor Introductions
item.content:encoded: Hello, new here, in most games/forums/sites I am Kaze N. R., but Kaze will do (I have found disliking how my name is mangled by the language). I'm mexican, played… umm.. a month and half or so. I created a village (just 'cause) called Dark Star a little while, I like to check here for info, and found that some of the basics were lacking so decided to apport. I gess that I know some things because I'm really new to the game.

item.title: Re: Contributor Introductions
item.content:encoded: Hello, here and in most games/forums I am called NikolaSama or Nikola-Sama but just call me Nick. Played BvS for 1,5 of a month I think, great game. This site was of great help to me, as it gave me info on how to get the Ro-Sham-Bo Redux party, that rocks! Also, I just like to check here for new info, like leveling your allies.

item.title: Re: Contributor Introductions
item.content:encoded:
Hi I'm Moaré. I have played this game for over a year. It's a great game and I uses Ainn as character name. I was the secund to contribute to this wiki, and still contributes as I sees it nessesary. I knows a lot about the game.

I'm a Moderator

I'm currently trying to clean up the Forum

item.title: Re: Contributor Introductions
item.content:encoded:
What's up. I figure I'll keep the ball rolling and see how many other people we could get in here.

I'm TikiTDO, and my BvS character is creatively named TikiTDO. I would honestly prefer it if people just referred to me as Tiki. I too have been playing for about two weeks, and figured I'd help edit the wiki every once in a while as it is now the best source of BvS information. When I finally make Jounin I should be able to spend a bit more time filling stuff in, as right now I'm just focused on gathering all the items/allies I can get easily. Fortunately, most of the articles that need filling are about things I have yet to do, thus I will be more active when I actually get to the point of doing them.

Unfortunately it doesn't seem like wikidot has signature support on the forums, so unless you want to paste your signature manually in each post you're out of luck.

item.title: Contributor Introductions
item.content:encoded:
Hey there!

We've been working together on this Wiki for a bit now, and for the most part, the only person you've really had a chance to talk with is me. So I figured setting up this forum would help to develop a sense of community in the Wiki. And what better way to get to know each other than to introduce each other! So, I'll go ahead and start.

So I'm BvS-Uzuki, but you guys can call me Uzuki. I've been playing BvS for a few weeks now and thought it was a great game, but that it was really hard to find information about it. So I went ahead and setup this Wiki to help out. My current character is Uzuki from Murder Village. I'll have to say, I've learned a ton about the game since I set things up, so I'm very much glad I did.

I'd include my BvS signature image, but I can't figure out quite how to do that yet ;)
